LanguageData.RimTalk_RainbowCandy.label: Rainbow Candy
LanguageData.RimTalk_RainbowCandy.description: A glowing candy that radiates five colors. It is said that anyone who eats it will speak in rainbows.
LanguageData.RimTalk_BlackWhitePill.label: B&W Pill
LanguageData.RimTalk_BlackWhitePill.description: A mysterious pill, half black and half white. Consuming it turns your speech into a spooky noir style.
LanguageData.RimTalk_ClearSoup.label: Clear Soup
LanguageData.RimTalk_ClearSoup.description: A bottle of clear water with a faint herbal scent. Drinking it calms the mind and removes all speech hallucinations.
